title: What are examples of information technology in daily life? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think there's so many example of information technology in our daily life. The word information and technology which means all of information that is provided by technology. Every day we use information technology such as social media, television, computer, and etc. I think this(quora) platform is also information technology. Which can provide so much necessary information to the whole world

Other than ur daily gadgets like Laptops, tablets, phone, tv etc how do u book tickets online? Pay bills online? Do u withdraw money from ATM? Do u use a credit card? Bus, trains, flight all ticket kiosks have softwares running inside. No matter what you do, you are dependent on Technology.
